title: The Emotional Vintners

tech: Emotions can be extracted and stored in glass vessels
Extracted emotions maintain potency for exactly one lunar cycle
Each emotion has distinct visual properties when bottled
Multiple emotions cannot be mixed without neutralizing both
constraints: Only genuine emotions can be bottled, artificial feelings dissolve
Extracting emotions leaves the donor temporarily hollow
Consuming bottled emotions creates dependency over time

value_spectrums.definition: Living with natural emotional pain vs seeking artificial emotional relief
Monetizing human feelings vs preserving emotional sanctity
Personal emotional sovereignty vs sharing emotional burden

gestures: Touching throat when speaking of emotions
Tilting empty bottle to indicate emotional bankruptcy

notes: Focus on personal stories that highlight the moral complexity of emotional commerce and addiction
